keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Iranian officials on Wednesday sought to play down the significance of Iran’s seizure of a cargo ship a day earlier in the Strait of Hormuz.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iran: Ship’s Seizure Tied to Court Case
headline.main: Iran: Ship’s Seizure Tied to Court Case

snippet: Iranian officials on Wednesday sought to play down the significance of Iran’s seizure of a cargo ship a day earlier in the Strait of Hormuz.
abstract: Iranian Foreign Min Mohammad Javad Zarif says cargo ship seized in Strait of Hormuz is owned by corporate defendant in a civil case, denying move was message to other nations over navigational freedom; some analysts say impoundment is response to deployment of American warships near Yemen's coast.
